snippet: A new app measures your energy consumption, "likes" become ads on Facebook, the Agriculture Department will increase tests for E. coli in raw beef and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: A new app measures your energy consumption, "likes" become ads on Facebook, the Agriculture Department will increase tests for E. coli in raw beef and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Friday Reading: A New App Measures Your Energy Consumption
